data_table.description: Derived Variables, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: GRADE41
variable.description: Photo gradable: 1=yes, 0=no [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: GRADE42
variable.description: Gradeability of photo, definition #2 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: ARTSS41
variable.description: Arterial sum of squares [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: VEINSS41
variable.description: Vein sum of squares [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: CRVE41
variable.description: Derived CRVE41 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: CRAE_B41
variable.description: Derived CRAE_B41 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: AV_B41
variable.description: Visit 4 AVR branch [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: ASPIRINCODE41
variable.description: Used aspirin-containing analgesics (at visit 4) in last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes), based on 2004 med code [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: STATINCODE41
variable.description: Used statin (at visit 4) last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes) based on 2004 med code [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: ANTICOAGCODE41
variable.description: Used anticoagulates (at visit 4) last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes) based on 2004 med code [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: LVHSCR41
variable.description: Cornell voltage in UV (S in visit 3+r in AVL) [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: NLVHSC41
variable.description: Cornell voltage in mm [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: CLVH41
variable.description: LVH present by Cornell definition [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: MDDXMI41
variable.description: Visit 4, MD diagnosed myocardial infarction [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: HXOFMI41
variable.description: Visit 4, history of myocardial infarction [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: PRVCHD42
variable.description: Visit 4, prevalent coronary heart disease - unverified [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: MENOPS41
variable.description: Menopausal status at visit 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: HORMON41
variable.description: Visit 4, hormone use [Cohort, Exam 4]
variable.value: Former hormone user or former User of other medications reported by participants as hormones

variable.name: QWAVE44A
variable.description: Diagnostic Q-wave present [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: QWAVE47A
variable.description: Major Q-wave present without codes 711 or 74 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: QWAVE48B
variable.description: Minor Q-wave with S or ST & No codes 711/74 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: QWVEM48B
variable.description: Same as QWAVE48B but uses machine code [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMI41
variable.description: Prevalent myocardial infarction from adjudicated ECG [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: MACHMI41
variable.description: Pre myocard infarction from machine coded ECG [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: HYPERT44
variable.description: Hypertension, definition 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: HYPERT45
variable.description: Hypertension, definition 5 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: HYPERT46
variable.description: Hypertension, definition 6 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: DRNKR41
variable.description: Drinker status variable [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: ETHANL41
variable.description: Usual alcohol intake in Grams/Week [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: CURDRK41
variable.description: Current drinker [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: FORDRK41
variable.description: Former drinker [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: EVRDRK41
variable.description: Ever drinker [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: WSTHPR41
variable.description: Waist-to-hip ratio [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: QWAVEM47
variable.description: Same as QWAVE47A but uses machine code [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: FAST0841
variable.description: Fasting time of 8 hours or more [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: FAST1241
variable.description: Fasting time of 12 hours or more [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: DIABTS41
variable.description: Diabetes using lower cutpoint 140 Mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: DIABTS42
variable.description: Diabetes using lower cutpoint 126 Mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: LDL41
variable.description: Re-calibrated LDL cholesterol in mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: HYPTMD41
variable.description: Visit 3, hypertension medications, definition 1 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: RACEGRP
variable.description: Race (from FTRA23) [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: GENDER
variable.description: Sex (From FTRA22) [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: COMPLET4
variable.description: Indicator for visit 4 participation [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: TCHSIU41
variable.description: Visit 4, total cholesterol in SI units [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: HDLSIU41
variable.description: Re-calibrated HDL cholesterol in mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: LDLSIU41
variable.description: Re-calibrated LDL cholesterol in mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: TRGSIU41
variable.description: Visit 4, triglycerides in SI units [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: GLUSIU41
variable.description: Visit 4, fasting glucose in SI units [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: GL2SIU41
variable.description: Visit 4 , two hour glucose in SI units [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: CIGT41
variable.description: Cigarette smoking status [Cohort, Exam 4]
variable.value: Unknown, but one of the above 3 categories may be ruled out

variable.name: CURSMK41
variable.description: Current cigarette smoker [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: FORSMK41
variable.description: Former cigarette smoker [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: EVRSMK41
variable.description: Ever smoked cigarettes [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: V4AGE41
variable.description: Age at visit 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: TGLEFH41
variable.description: Triglycerides <= 400 Mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: BIFSHD41
variable.description: Shadowing in either carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: INTSHD41
variable.description: Shadowing in either internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: COMSHD41
variable.description: Shadowing in either common carotid [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: BIFPLQ41
variable.description: Plaque in either carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: INTPLQ41
variable.description: Plaque in either internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: COMPLQ41
variable.description: Plaque in either common carotid [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: LCOMPS41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in the left common [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: RCOMPS41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in right common carotid [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: LBIFPS41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in left bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: RBIFPS41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in right carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: RINTPS41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in right internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: LINTPS41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in left internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: COMPS41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either common [Cohort, Exam 4]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: BIFPS41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 4]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: INTPS41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either internal [Cohort, Exam 4]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: LPLQSD41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in any left carotid site [Cohort, Exam 4]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: RPLQSD41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in any right carotid site [Cohort, Exam 4]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: PLQSHD41
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in any carotid site [Cohort, Exam 4]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: PLAQUE41
variable.description: Plaque in any site [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: PLAQUE42
variable.description: Alternate definition plaque in any site [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: ABI44
variable.description: Ankle Brachial Index V4, definition 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: ABIV4
variable.description: ABI Measurement status at visit 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: PAD42
variable.description: Peripheral artery disease [PAD], visit 4, definition 2 (same for both genders) [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: PAD41
variable.description: Peripheral artery disease visit 4, definition 1 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: LEGANK41
variable.description: Leg used at visit 4 for ankle blood pressure [Cohort, Exam 4]
variable.value: UBAA02D (Scan date, day) equal to an even #
UBAA02D (Scan date, day) is missing and V3DATE31 equal to an even # for the day part
UBAA02D (Scan date, day) equal to an odd #
UBAA02D (Scan date, day) is missing and V3DATE31 equal to an odd # for the day part

variable.name: LEGSAM14
variable.description: Same leg used for ankle blood pressure at visit 1 and 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: LEGSAM34
variable.description: Same leg used for ankle blood pressure at visit 3 and 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: INCPAD4
variable.description: Incident peripheral artery disease [PAD] at visit 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: INCPAD
variable.description: Incident PAD at visit 3 or visit 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: PRVCHD43
variable.description: Prevalent coronary heart disease at visit 4, definition 3 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: PRVSTR41
variable.description: Prevalent stroke at visit 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: HYPTMDCODE41
variable.description: Hypertension lowering medication within past 2 weeks (visit 4) [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: CHDRISK10YR_41
variable.description: Predicted 10 year risk of incident coronary heart disease (CHD) [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: STROKERISK10YR_41
variable.description: Predicted 10 year risk of incident ischemic stroke [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: DIABETESRISK9YR_41
variable.description: Predicted 9 year risk of incident type two diabetes [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: CHOLMDCODE41
variable.description: Cholesterol lowering medication within 2wks: using 2004 med code -visit 3 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: CHOLMDCODE42
variable.description: Medications which secondarily affect cholesterol: using 2004 med code -visit 4 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: BMI41
variable.description: Body Mass Index in Kg/M**2 [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: CENTERID
variable.description: Recoded Center ID [Cohort, Exam 4]

variable.name: V4DAYS
variable.description: Days since exam 1 [Cohort, Exam 4]
